ResumePage.name: Sie Ren-Bin
ResumePage.about: Front End developer, dedicated to user-friendly UI UX, scalable web applications and also javascript ecosystem
ResumePage.summary: I specialize in taking products from concept to implant and is also well-experience to cooperate with the international team. I excel in building scalable and maintainable code-base. For the current time, I am dedicated to the 'Javascript Ecosystem' with React, Next.js,Redux, Angular, Rxjs and a taste of Node.js for the most of the time.

record.degree: ‚Ä¢ Master Degree of Fine Arts Department
‚Ä¢ Bachelor's Degree in Fine Arts Department

work.title: Front End Developer
work.description:
Description
‚Ä¢ Utilized Angular 18 to assist the team in developing the "Content Management Backend"; the main features include API calls, authentication, and login processes

Essential
‚Ä¢ Component modularization and config file design; improved the efficiency of new page development and maintenance of old pages
‚Ä¢ Login and logout processes; understood business requirements and met security needs
‚Ä¢ API call design; helped team members get up to speed with maintenance and subsequent debugging
‚Ä¢ Data flow; abstracted libraries of functions to enhance code readability

Others
‚Ä¢ Set up the development environment in a closed environment (without internet access)

work.title: Front End Developer
work.description:
Essential
‚Ä¢ Customize Angular and Spartacus model to map CMS component data on the client side
‚Ä¢ Refactor the sharable logic of Redux data storage for team's usage
‚Ä¢ Introduce tools, Ngrok, Androind Studio..., to set up the way of testing on versatile devices for teams
‚Ä¢ Customize NPM module to assist teams with the speed of development
‚Ä¢ Upgrade important version, help the project to migrate from CSR to SSR

Support
‚Ä¢ Hot fix on payment issue by redesigning the moment of loading session
‚Ä¢ Refactor the legacy code for better readability and maintenance

Others
‚Ä¢ Design UI/UX layout via Figma and generate the basic well-ruled wireframe
‚Ä¢ Basic concept about back-end and database in both Node.js and Java
‚Ä¢ Familiar with business logic of eCommerce, SAP Commerce and Hybris
‚Ä¢ Project management tools, Jira, Confluence...

work.title: Front End Developer
work.description:
Essential
‚Ä¢ Based on the next.js, build up the basic structure of the project
‚Ä¢ Set up principles, folder struture, rules for css style, and introducing the formatter.
‚Ä¢ Set up Data flow, the style for API fetching, storing for local or global data via the differnet way, props, context, redux or even local storage.

Others
‚Ä¢ Familiar with essential requirement of backstage
‚Ä¢ Git, using version control to point to development or production
